2015.expert_review:
Vehicle Overview

The NV is Nissan’s entrant in the full-size commercial van category. Offered in either normal- or high-roof body styles, the NV is available in cargo- or passenger-van form, the latter with seating for up to 12 people. The NV is available in three versions: 1500, 2500 HD and 3500 HD. It competes with the Chevrolet Express, Ford Transit and Ram ProMaster.
New for 2015
The NV cargo van has a new SL trim level that includes chrome exterior trim, chrome wheels, an eight-way power driver’s seat and a security system.

Below is a list of highlighted features and not an exhaustive list. Features are standard unless otherwise noted.
Exterior Highlights

High or standard roof body styles
Sliding passenger side door and two rear doors that can swing open 243 degrees
Standard-roof NV models fit in most garages and through most drive-through lanes
17-inch steel wheels, available chrome and silver painted wheels
Available chrome bumpers and side mirrors
Available privacy glass

Interior Highlights

Seats up to 12 people in passenger van form
Numerous storage spaces throughout interior
Boxed wheel wells
Rear-door storage compartment
Standard roof provides up to 234.1 cubic feet of cargo room; high roof offers 320.1 cubic feet
Heavy-duty waterproof vinyl seats
Seven available ceiling-mounted reading lights
Available heated leather seats (passenger van)
Fits up to two 40-by-48-inch pallets (cargo van)
Six  floor-mounted D-rings for securing cargo (cargo van)
Available cargo lighting with three dome lights (cargo van)
Available 12- and 120-volt outlets
Fold-flat passenger seat provides a desklike surface
Available cruise control
Available Bluetooth connectivity
Available touch-screen navigation/stereo with iPod integration

Under the Hood

261-horsepower, 4.0-liter V-6 engine
Available 317-hp, 5.6-liter V-8
Five-speed automatic transmission
Rear-wheel drive
Heavy-duty brakes

Safety Features

Required in every new vehicle: front airbags, antilock brakes and an electronic stability system
Available side-impact airbags
Available side curtain airbags
Available backup camera

Notable features: New SL trim level for cargo van
